IISER Pune Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for Multi Skilled Assistant Post
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 25, 2025, 17:20 IST
 Indian Institute of Science Education and Research
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 25-Aug-2025 |  Maharashtra |  Salary : 39,500 to 39,500




FOLLOW

Indian Institute of Science Education and Research (IISER) Pune has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Multi-Skilled Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in Any Degree can grab this chance and apply for the IISER Pune Recruitment 2025. Here, we included the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible applicants can attend the walk-in at the given venue.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Maharashtra

IISER Pune Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Multi Skilled Assistant 	01	Any Degree

Age Limit for the IISER Pune Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 33 years.

Selection Process for the IISER Pune Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the IISER Pune Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 39,500 /- per month.

Application fee for the IISER Pune Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the IISER Pune Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Multi Skilled Assistant Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Then, attend the interview at the address given below.

Venue

Seminar Room No. 33, 2 nd Floor, Main Building, IISER Pune, Dr. Homi Bhabha Road, Pune – 411008

Important Dates

Date of Walk-in-Interview	29-08-2025
Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
